attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Green House Theory and its Global Warming fellow travelers have been shown to be hoaxes by legitimate scientists as we see average global temperatures drop and record snowfalls thorughout the world. Now we know why the hoax is being perpetuated. Socialists New World Order governments like that of Mr Gordon Brown's are trying to use the hoax as a power play for themselves and further wreck our economies as well as the dreams of low and middle income UK citizens.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
